title: Introduction to MEMS
description: Introduction to Micro-Electro-Mechanical systems: Microfabrication techniques including: photolithography, etching, physical and chemical vapor deposition, electroplating, bonding and polymer processing.  Application to sensors and actuators.  Credit not allowed for both ECE 6229 and ME 6229 or CHBE 6229.
